import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import "./styles/CribsList.css" // import Crib from "./Crib" function CribsList() { const [comment, setComment] = useState("") const [rating, setRating] = useState("") const [all, setData] = useState([]) useEffect(() =>{ fetch("http://localhost:9292/reviews") .then((response) =>response.json()) .then(data =>setData(data)) }, []) function handleAdd(newReview){ setData(data) } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); fetch ("http://localhost:9292/reviews", { method: 'POST', headers: {"Content-Type": "application/json"}, body: JSON.stringify({ comment:comment, star_rating:rating }) }).then(response => response.json()) .then(newReview=>handleAdd(newReview)) setComment('') setRating('') } console.log(data) return ( <>
